casebody.data:
SWAN BEACH COROLLA, L.L.C., et al.
v.
COUNTY OF CURRITUCK, et al. 397A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 10, 2018 G. Nicholas Herman, Attorney at Law, Donald I. McRee, Jr., Currituck County Attorney, for County of Currituck, et al. J. Mitchell Armbruster, Attorney at Law, Lacy H. Reaves, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Swan Beach Corolla, L.L.C., et al. Lars P. Simonsen, Attorney at Law, Edenton, Roger W. Knight, Attorney at Law, Micah R. Simonsen, Attorney at Law, for Fruitville Beach Civic Association, Inc., et al. James S. Schenck, IV, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Amy Y. Bason, General Counsel, for N.C. Association of County Commissioners.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of January 2018 by Fruitville Beach Civic Association, Inc. and Northern Currituck Outer Bank Association, Inc. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of January 2018."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
